api_list.name: Base
api_list.description: With this endpoint you will have information of all the opportuinities detected by the algoritm. Soon we will add parameters in order to filter the results by traded currency, pattern and temporality.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://crypto-detector1.p.rapidapi.com/api"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crypto-detector1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://crypto-detector1.p.rapidapi.com/api"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crypto-detector1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
